respondents: 4th September, 1990 and on page No.111 of the said Minutes Book, it is found that unsigned copy of minute of Order dated 21st June, 1990 passed by the then His Lordship Shri Justice H. Suresh in abovementioned Notice of Motion has been pested as well as it is also put on record that unsigned copy of oral judgment dated 21st June, 1990 (total pages, out of it last page No.14 is in torned condition) is found in the Record and proceedings. .2/ : 2 : However, as per the office report dated 27th February, 2017, it is put on the record that Ms. Vandana M. Thakkar, Advocate for D/o. Erstwhile Insolvent, who filed the preacipe in this matter has not filed Vakalatnama on behalf of her client. In view of the above, Registry is directed to return this application dated st December, 2016 to the Certified copy Department for doing the needful on their part. Hence, matter be removed from the Board. Sd/ Insolvency Registrar. rrk/drt.
judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT AT BOMBAY
IN INSOLVENCY
NOTICE OF MOTION NO. 152 OF 1989
A N D
NOTICE OF MOTION NO. 36 OF 1990
IN
INSOLVENCY PETITION No.116 of 1971

 Before : Insolvency Registrar,

 High Court, Bombay.
Date : 27th February, 2017 at 3.00 p.m.
   Re : Mathuradas G. Thakkar. ........Insolvent.
None Present.
To day, this matter is placed on Board for reconstruction of Minutes of 
Order and Oral Judgment dated 21st June, 1990 passed by Hon'ble Shri Justice 
H. Suresh in abovementioned matter as per the directions given by the Ld. 
Prothonotary & Senior Master on 6th February, 2017.
Pursuant to this office submission dated 1st  February, 2017, it is put on 
record that the said Original oral Order and Minutes of Order dated 21st June, 
are not traceable. However, the Registry could trace out the Minutes Book 
for the period between 6th March, 1990 and 4th  September, 1990 and on page 
No.111 of the said Minutes Book, it is found that unsigned copy of minute of 
Order dated 21st  June, 1990 passed by the then His Lordship Shri Justice H. 
Suresh in abovementioned Notice of Motion has been pested as well as it is also 
put on record that unsigned copy of oral judgment dated 21st June, 1990 (total 
pages, out of it last page No.14 is in torned condition) is found in the Record 
and proceedings.
 .2/ 
: 2 :
However, as per the office report dated 27th February, 2017, it is put on the 
record that Ms. Vandana M. Thakkar, Advocate for D/o. Erstwhile Insolvent, who 
filed the preacipe in this matter has not filed Vakalatnama on behalf of her client.
In view of the above, Registry is directed to return this application dated 
st December, 2016 to the Certified copy Department for doing the needful on 
their part.
Hence, matter be removed from the Board.
 Sd/ 
 Insolvency Registrar.
rrk/drt.
